card.name: Diners Club Privilege Credit Card
card.description: A premium credit card offering exclusive rewards, dining, travel, and lifestyle benefits for global citizens who cherish the unexplored and savor the exotic.
card.target_audience: Global citizens, frequent travelers, premium lifestyle seekers

categories.name: Retail spends
categories.description: Earn 4 Reward Points for every ₹150 spent on retail purchases excluding rent and government spends.
categories.how_to_earn: Use the card for retail purchases.

categories.name: Swiggy and Zomato
categories.description: Earn 5X Reward Points (20 points per ₹150) on Swiggy and Zomato spends with an additional 4X capped at 2500 points per calendar month.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Minimum transaction value ₹150. Only transactions settled from merchant eligible. Capped at 2500 reward points per calendar month.
categories.how_to_earn: Use card directly on Swiggy and Zomato.

categories.name: SmartBuy purchases
categories.description: Earn up to 10X Reward Points on purchases via SmartBuy platform.

bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Get vouchers worth ₹1,500 from Marriott, Decathlon, Barbeque Nation, O2 Spa or Lakme Salon.

redemption.process: Redeem reward points on SmartBuy or NetBanking for flights and hotel bookings.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Redeem up to 70% of booking value through Reward Points.

redemption.process: Redeem reward points on exclusive dining catalogue via SmartBuy.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Visit offers.smartbuy.hdfcbank.com/diners and select 'Exclusive Dining Catalogue'.

benefits.name: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on BookMyShow
benefits.description: Get Buy 1 Get 1 Free on movie/non-movie weekend tickets via BookMyShow for shows on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.
benefits.how_to_avail: Use HDFC Diners Club Privilege Credit Card on BookMyShow website or app and validate card number at payment page.
benefits.value: Maximum discount Rs. 250 per ticket, up to 2 free tickets per calendar month.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Offer valid only on BookMyShow website/app, excludes gift cards, F&B, and BMS Stream.

benefits.name: Airport Lounge Access
benefits.description: 2 complimentary airport lounge accesses every calendar quarter worldwide.
benefits.how_to_avail: Present your Diners Club Privilege Credit Card at participating lounges.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Complimentary on spends of Rs. 15,000 in previous calendar quarter.

benefits.name: Complimentary Annual Memberships
benefits.description: Complimentary annual memberships of Swiggy One and Times Prime on spending Rs. 75,000 within first 90 days of card issuance.
benefits.how_to_avail: Spend Rs. 75,000 within 90 days of card issuance.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Memberships unlocked within 48 hours of meeting criteria.

benefits.name: Quarterly Vouchers
benefits.description: Get vouchers worth Rs. 1,500 from Marriott, Decathlon, Barbeque Nation, O2 Spa, or Lakme Salon on spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh in a calendar quarter.
benefits.how_to_avail: Track and redeem via SmartBuy portal.

benefits.name: Renewal Fee Waiver
benefits.description: Renewal fee waiver on spends of Rs. 3 lakh in card anniversary year.
benefits.how_to_avail: Spend Rs. 3 lakh in anniversary year.

benefits.name: Travel and Accident Insurance
benefits.description: Air accident cover worth ₹1 crore, emergency overseas hospitalization up to ₹25 Lacs, baggage delay cover up to ₹50,000, and credit liability cover up to ₹9 Lakh.
benefits.how_to_avail: Insurance activated when tickets purchased using Diners Club Privilege Credit Card.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Valid for international travel only, subject to policy terms.

current_offers.title: Good Food Trail Program
current_offers.description: Flat 10% extra off on dining bills at 35,000+ restaurants when paying with HDFC Bank Credit Card via Swiggy Dineout.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Offer inclusive of restaurant and Swiggy discount. T&C apply.

perks.name: Contactless Payment
perks.description: Enabled for contactless payments on HDFC Bank POS machines for fast, convenient, and secure payments.
perks.usage_limit: Up to ₹5,000 per transaction without PIN in India
perks.how_to_use: Look for contactless symbol on card and tap on POS machine.
perks.terms_and_conditions: For transactions ₹5,000 or more, PIN required.

perks.name: Smart EMI
perks.description: Option to convert big spends into EMI after purchase.
perks.how_to_use: Available on HDFC Bank Diners Club Privilege Credit Card.
perks.terms_and_conditions: Refer to Fees and Charges section for details.

partnerships.benefit: ₹1,500 worth vouchers on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid at participating Marriott hotels in India.

partnerships.benefit: ₹1,500 voucher on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid at Decathlon retail outlets and website.

partnerships.benefit: ₹1,500 voucher on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid for dine-in only at Barbeque Nation restaurants.

partnerships.benefit: ₹1,500 voucher on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid at Lakme Salon network.

partnerships.benefit: ₹1,500 voucher on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
partnerships.how_to_avail: Redeem via SmartBuy Milestone Page and book appointment via call center.
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Voucher valid at O2 Spa outlets.

fees_and_charges.terms_and_conditions: Charged on all foreign currency spends, billed within 60 days from date of visit.
Coverage for credit liability up to ₹9 lakh.

fees_and_charges.waiver_conditions: Waived on spends of Rs. 3 lakh in card anniversary year.
